subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With runners on second and third and no outs in the fourth inning Wednesday night, Alex Rodriguez hit a ground ball between shortstop and third base. It was fielded by Cleveland shortstop Jhonny Peralta, but his throw to first was high and first baseman Ben Broussard was unable to handle it cleanly.
